product_overview: StartinOS CRM is a SaaS product designed for digital marketing agencies, providing a centralized platform to manage clients, sales pipelines, quizzes for lead generation, agency teams, contracts, and subscription billing. It features a unique retro/pixel art aesthetic for an engaging user experience.
core_goals: Centralize agency operations including lead, contract, and team management
Increase engagement through interactive quizzes for lead capture
Provide a scalable subscription model with tiered plans integrated with Stripe
Deliver a distinctive visual identity with a retro pixel art UI for differentiation
key_features: User authentication with role-based access control
Agency profile and team management with secure invite links
Dashboard with performance metrics and data visualizations
Kanban-style sales pipeline management with drag-and-drop
Interactive quiz builder and public quiz runner for marketing lead generation
Subscription plan management with Stripe billing integration
Public landing page for product marketing
user_flow_summary: User visits landing page, signs up or logs in with secure authentication and role-based access
Agency owners create and manage agency profile, invite team members via token links, and assign roles
Users access dashboard to view KPIs, navigate to CRM pipeline, contacts, contracts, or quizzes
Sales teams manage leads through a drag-and-drop Kanban pipeline interface
Marketing teams build quizzes to capture leads, distribute them publicly, and analyze responses
Agency manages contracts and team permissions according to roles
Owners upgrade or change subscription plans, with UI updates that reflect plan limits and billing status
validation_criteria: All routes enforce authentication and role-based permissions properly
Quiz responses are saved and retrievable for analysis
Drag-and-drop functionality in pipeline works smoothly and persists state
Stripe integration processes subscription payments and updates correctly
Agency invites send unique tokens and enforce membership roles
UI matches the retro pixel art design specifications and responsiveness requirements
Dashboard metrics display accurate and timely data reflecting backend state
